summary: A model class that encapsulates a UniSpeech SAT architecture tailored for sequence classification tasks on speech data. It manages model initialization, processes inputs through a forward computation pipeline, and offers utilities to selectively lock the base network, feature encoder, or feature extractor layers for transfer‑learning scenarios.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly deploy and fine‑tune a pre‑trained speech representation model for classification applications, while providing control over which components are trainable to optimize performance and resource usage.
